mapper.update: UPDATE stock SET amount=#{amount} WHERE stock_no=#{stock_no}
mapper.select: SELECT c.color_no, c.color_name FROM stock s INNER JOIN color c WHERE c.color_no=s.color_no AND item_no=#{item_no} GROUP BY c.color_no
SELECT si.size_no, si.size_name FROM stock s INNER JOIN size si WHERE si.size_no=s.size_no AND item_no=#{item_no} GROUP BY si.size_no
select stock_no from stock where item_no=#{item_no} AND size_no=#{size_no} AND color_no=#{color_no};
